subject: Re: [sugar] Getting sugar running on a Mac
body:
I have a MacBook and here is what I personnaly do :
I have a Parallels image of Fedora Core 6 and installed Sugar-jhbuild there. 
We've written our software (TamTam) in a way where we can run it under FC6
without the need to be inside sugar so usually I just run the app as a normal
App. When I need to test it under sugar I either do it in sugar-build or on the
real XO.  

_______________________________________________
Sugar mailing list
Sugar@laptop.org
http://mailman.laptop.org/mailman/listinfo/sugar
